name: qna
description: To install the client directory, you download the javascript packages from npm. From the root of the github repo were pwd= `.../QnA/` use this shell script: ```sh cd client npm install ``` to run the server

scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.start: cd server && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate pip install -r requirements.txt && flask run
